name: ai_adoption_stats
prompt: Clean, modern bar chart infographic showing 'AI Adoption Rate' rising from 10% in 2020 to 85% in 2026. Data visualization style with sleek bars in gradient blue (#00d4ff) to purple (#7b2cbf). Dark background (#1a1a2e). Text labels in white sans-serif font. Professional business aesthetic, 16:9 aspect ratio, High resolution, 8k, sharp vector graphics, clear text.
